value:
$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|Arden, come here, and be quick. It's
time you put your life on the line for
Sigurd. Keep him safe, now.$k$pStrong and tough, I grant you. But
why must you be so slow?$k$p$WmMPID_アーダン,ch06_05_Arden_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Hey! Strong and tough is good. I like
that. But slow! Why is it always
slow?$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Come now, Arden. Do this for me.
You're the only one I can rely on right
now.$k$p$WmMPID_アーダン,ch06_05_Arden_M_Normal,Face|$w0|All right, all right. I'll give it everything I
got, same as always. Just don't leave
me behind!$k$p$WmMPID_シグルド,ch06_04_Siglud_M_Normal,Face|$w0|The fight begins!$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMEID_ヴェロニカ,ch00_04_Veronica_F_Normal,Face|$w0|You've done enough, Arden. Stand
down.$k$p$WmMPID_アーダン,ch06_05_Arden_M_Normal,Face|$w0|Got it! Off I go!$k$p$Sbs150|
